    • isConflict

      public boolean isConflict(Building b)
      This function checks if two buildings are conflict. If so, returns true, otherwise return false
      Parameters:
      b - the building that you want to check for conflicts.
      Returns:
      The method returns true if there is a conflict, otherwise returns false.

      Parameters:

    • add

      public boolean add(Building var)
      If inputs are valid, the building is added to the ArrayList
      Parameters:
      var - The building that is being added to the ArrayList.
      Returns:
      The method returns true if the building is added to the ArrayList, and false if the building is not added to the ArrayList.

    • remove

      public void remove(int pos, int index) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException

      Parameters:

      index - The index of the building that will be removed.
      Throws:

    • checkInputsValidity

      public boolean checkInputsValidity(Building b)
      This method checks if the building fits to street, if the inputs are valid and if there is conflict. If building appropriate to street, returns true.
      Parameters:
      b - the building to be added to the street.
      Returns:
      A boolean value.
